meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she wore a blue dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: He wore his favorite hat to the baseball game.
meanings.sent3: The cat wore a tiny hat for Halloween, looking quite dapper.
meanings.sent4: Her smile wore a mask of happiness, hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The old photograph wore memories of a bygone era.

meanings.definition: to have on one's body as clothing
meanings.sent1: During winter, she wore a warm coat to stay cozy.
meanings.sent2: He wore a suit and tie to the important meeting.
meanings.sent3: The dog wore a silly costume, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His confidence wore a cloak of success in the business world.
meanings.sent5: The dress she wore shimmered under the lights of the dance floor.

meanings.definition: to exhibit or present (a particular facial expression or appearance)
meanings.sent1: Despite feeling nervous, she wore a confident smile.
meanings.sent2: He wore a puzzled expression when trying to solve the riddle.
meanings.sent3: The clown wore a sad face but brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes wore a look of determination as she faced the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The painting wore an expression of melancholy, evoking deep emotions.
